name: promptify
title: Promptify
description:
One-key prompt enhancer for any AI. 
Select → copy → Promptify shows a clean, structured version. 
Works locally with Ollama. 
History + JSON export.
author: thomas-basadonne

commands.name: enhance-prompt-general
commands.title: Enhance Prompt (General)
commands.subtitle: Preview → Copy/Paste
commands.description: Reads text from Clipboard, applies the General preset, shows a Markdown preview, then Copy / Paste into the active app. Saves to History and lets you export JSON.

commands.name: enhance-prompt---images
commands.title: Enhance Prompt — Images
commands.subtitle: NanoBanana / Sora / Midjourney / FLUX / SD
commands.description: Optimizes prompts for image models: subject, style, composition, lens, lighting, color, extras, negative prompts. Preview, Copy/Paste, History, JSON export.

commands.name: enhance-prompt---code
commands.title: Enhance Prompt — Code
commands.subtitle: Tech tasks & specs
commands.description: Optimizes technical prompts: language/version, constraints, output format (diff/snippet/tests), edge cases. Preview, Copy/Paste, History, JSON export.

commands.name: history
commands.title: History
commands.subtitle: Recent results
commands.description: Browse the last enhanced prompts. Copy, Paste, Copy JSON, or delete items.

commands.name: manage-presets
commands.title: Manage Presets
commands.subtitle: Create, edit, import/export
commands.description: Manage custom presets: create new, edit existing, duplicate, import/export JSON, delete. Built-in presets can be duplicated and customized.

preferences.name: provider
preferences.title: AI Provider
preferences.description: Choose which AI provider to use for prompt enhancement

preferences.name: ollamaModel
preferences.title: Ollama Model
preferences.description: Model name to use for enhancement

preferences.name: autoPaste
preferences.title: Auto Paste
preferences.description: Automatically paste after copying enhanced prompt
preferences.label: Enable auto paste

preferences.name: saveToHistory
preferences.title: Save to History
preferences.description: Automatically save enhanced prompts to history
preferences.label: Enable history saving

preferences.name: maxHistoryItems
preferences.title: Max History Items
preferences.description: Maximum number of items to keep in history (10-100)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
